alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Shelby County through 330 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bartlett, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Eads, Ellendale, Elmore Park, Lenow and Fisherville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
